put.description:
Update a resource by its fides_key.

The `is_default` field cannot be updated and will respond
with a `403 Forbidden` if attempted.

detail.error: user does not have permission to modify this resource

post.description:
Create a resource.

Payloads with an is_default field can only be set to False,
will return a `403 Forbidden`.

detail.error: user does not have permission to modify this resource

get.description: Get a resource by its fides_key.

delete.description:
Delete a resource by its fides_key.

Resources that have `is_default=True` cannot be deleted and will respond
with a `403 Forbidden`.

detail.error: user does not have permission to modify this resource

post.description:
For any resource in `resources` that already exists in the database,
update the resource by its `fides_key`. Otherwise, create a new resource.

Responds with a `201 Created` if even a single resource in `resources`
did not previously exist. Otherwise, responds with a `200 OK`.

The `is_default` field cannot be updated and will respond
with a `403 Forbidden` if attempted.

get.description:
Visualize the hierarchy of a supported resource type.
Args:
    figure_type: type of figure, by name, to generate
    resource_type: hierarchy source. one of ["data_category", "data_qualifier", "data_use"]
Returns:
    Html for the requested figure. Response with status code 400 when invalid figure type is provided

Visualize the hierarchy of a supported resource type.
Args:
    figure_type: type of figure, by name, to generate
    resource_type: hierarchy source. one of ["data_category", "data_qualifier", "data_use"]
Returns:
    Html for the requested figure. Response with status code 400 when invalid figure type is provided

Visualize the hierarchy of a supported resource type.
Args:
    figure_type: type of figure, by name, to generate
    resource_type: hierarchy source. one of ["data_category", "data_qualifier", "data_use"]
Returns:
    Html for the requested figure. Response with status code 400 when invalid figure type is provided

post.description: Initiate one of the enumerated DBActions.

get.description:
An endpoint to return the data map for a given Organization.

The Organization `fides_key` is the only url parameter required. In most cases,
this should be `default_organization`

Uses shared logic from the CLI, first gathering all resources from the server then
formatting all attributes appropriately.

Returns the expected datamap for a given organization fides key as a set of records.

example.dataset.name: Fides Dataset
example.system.name: Fides System
example.system.privacy_declaration.data_use.name: Purpose of Processing
example.system.third_country_safeguards: Safeguards for Exceptional Transfers of Personal Data
example.system.privacy_declaration.data_use.lega: Article 6 lawful basis for processing personal data
example.system.privacy_declaration.data_use.spec: Article 9 condition for processing special category data
example.system.privacy_declaration.data_use.legi: Legitimate interests for the processing (if applicable)
Link to record of legitimate interests assessment (if applicable)
example.system.privacy_declaration.data_subjects: Existence of automated decision-making, including profiling (if applicable)
example.dataset.source_name: The source of the personal data (if applicable)
example.system.data_protection_impact_assessment: Link to Data Protection Impact Assessment

post.description:
A multi-purpose endpoint to generate Fides resources based on existing
infrastructure

Currently generates Fides resources for the following:
* AWS: Systems
* Okta: Systems
* DB: Datasets
* BigQuery: Datasets

In the future, this will include options for other Systems & Datasets,
examples include:
* Snowflake: Datasets

All production deployments should implement HTTPS for security purposes

get.description: Confirm that the API is running and healthy.

schema.title: Response Health Api V1 Health Get

get.description: Returns a User based on an Id

put.description:
Update a user given a `user_id`. By default this is limited to users
updating their own data.

delete.description: Deletes the User and associated ClientDetail if applicable.

post.description:
Update a user's password given a `user_id`. By default this is limited to users
updating their own data.
logout the user by deleting its client
Endpoint used to validate different resource targets.

get.description: Returns an html document with a list of evaluations
Returns a paginated list of all users

post.description: Create a user given a username and password.

Login the user by creating a client if it doesn't exist, and have that client
generate a token.

get.description: Return an index.html at the root path
Return related frontend files. Adapted from https://github.com/tiangolo/fastapi/issues/130

AWSConfig.title: AWSConfig
AWSConfig.description: The model for the connection config for AWS

AccessToken.title: AccessToken
AccessToken.description: A wrapper for the access_code returned upon successful authentication

BigQueryConfig.title: BigQueryConfig
BigQueryConfig.description: The model for the connection config for BigQuery

ContactDetails.title: ContactDetails

name.title: Name
name.description: An individual name used as part of publishing contact information. Encrypted at rest on the server.

address.title: Address
address.description: An individual address used as part of publishing contact information. Encrypted at rest on the server.

email.title: Email
email.description: An individual email used as part of publishing contact information. Encrypted at rest on the server.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: An individual phone number used as part of publishing contact information. Encrypted at rest on the server.

ContactDetails.description:
The contact details information model.

Used to capture contact information for controllers, used
as part of exporting a data map / ROPA.

This model is nested under an Organization and
potentially under a system/dataset.

DBActions.title: DBActions
DBActions.description: The available path parameters for the `/admin/db/{action}` endpoint.

fides_key.title: Fides Key
fides_key.description: A unique key used to identify this resource.

organization_fides_key.title: Organization Fides Key
organization_fides_key.description: Defines the Organization that this resource belongs to.

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of what this resource is.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Denotes whether the resource is part of the default taxonomy or not.

DataFlow.title: DataFlow

fides_key.title: Fides Key
fides_key.description: Identifies the System or Dataset resource with which the communication occurs. May also be 'user', to represent communication with the user(s) of a System.

type.title: Type
type.description: Specifies the resource model class for which the `fides_key` applies. May be any of dataset, system, user.

data_categories.title: Data Categories
data_categories.description: An array of data categories describing the data in transit.

DataFlow.description:
The DataFlow resource model.

Describes a resource model with which a given System resource communicates.

DataProtectionImpactAssessment.title: DataProtectionImpactAssessment

is_required.title: Is Required
is_required.description: A boolean value determining if a data protection impact assessment is required. Defaults to False.

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: The optional status of a Data Protection Impact Assessment. Returned on an exported data map or RoPA.

link.title: Link
link.description: The optional link to the Data Protection Impact Assessment. Returned on an exported data map or RoPA.

DataProtectionImpactAssessment.description:
The DataProtectionImpactAssessment (DPIA) resource model.

Contains information in regard to the data protection
impact assessment exported on a data map or Record of
Processing Activities (RoPA).

A legal requirement under GDPR for any project that
introduces a high risk to personal information.

fides_key.title: Fides Key
fides_key.description: A unique key used to identify this resource.

organization_fides_key.title: Organization Fides Key
organization_fides_key.description: Defines the Organization that this resource belongs to.

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of what this resource is.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Denotes whether the resource is part of the default taxonomy or not.

DataResponsibilityTitle.title: DataResponsibilityTitle
DataResponsibilityTitle.description:
The model defining the responsibility or role over
the system that processes personal data.

Used to identify whether the organization is a
Controller, Processor, or Sub-Processor of the data

fides_key.title: Fides Key
fides_key.description: A unique key used to identify this resource.

organization_fides_key.title: Organization Fides Key
organization_fides_key.description: Defines the Organization that this resource belongs to.

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of what this resource is.

rights.title: Rights
rights.description:
The DataSubjectRights resource model.

    Includes a strategy and optionally a
    list of data subject rights to apply
    via the set strategy.

automated_decisions_or_profiling.title: Automated Decisions Or Profiling
automated_decisions_or_profiling.description: A boolean value to annotate whether or not automated decisions/profiling exists for the data subject.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Denotes whether the resource is part of the default taxonomy or not.

DataSubjectRights.title: DataSubjectRights

strategy.description: Defines the strategy used when mapping data rights to a data subject.

values.description: A list of valid data subject rights to be used when applying data rights to a data subject via a strategy.

DataSubjectRights.description:
The DataSubjectRights resource model.

Includes a strategy and optionally a
list of data subject rights to apply
via the set strategy.

DataSubjectRightsEnum.title: DataSubjectRightsEnum
DataSubjectRightsEnum.description:
The model for data subject rights over
personal data.

Based upon chapter 3 of the GDPR

fides_key.title: Fides Key
fides_key.description: A unique key used to identify this resource.

organization_fides_key.title: Organization Fides Key
organization_fides_key.description: Defines the Organization that this resource belongs to.

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of what this resource is.

legal_basis.description: The legal basis category of which the data use falls under. This field is used as part of the creation of an exportable data map.

special_category.description: The special category for processing of which the data use falls under. This field is used as part of the creation of an exportable data map.

recipients.title: Recipients
recipients.description: An array of recipients when sharing personal data outside of your organization.

legitimate_interest.title: Legitimate Interest
legitimate_interest.description: A boolean representation of if the legal basis used is `Legitimate Interest`. Validated at run time and looks for a `legitimate_interest_impact_assessment` to exist if true.

legitimate_interest_impact_assessment.title: Legitimate Interest Impact Assessment
legitimate_interest_impact_assessment.description: A url pointing to the legitimate interest impact assessment. Required if the legal bases used is legitimate interest.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Denotes whether the resource is part of the default taxonomy or not.

DatabaseConfig.title: DatabaseConfig
DatabaseConfig.description: The model for the connection config for databases

fides_key.title: Fides Key
fides_key.description: A unique key used to identify this resource.

organization_fides_key.title: Organization Fides Key
organization_fides_key.description: Defines the Organization that this resource belongs to.

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of what this resource is.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: An optional object that provides additional information about the Dataset. You can structure the object however you like. It can be a simple set of `key: value` properties or a deeply nested hierarchy of objects. How you use the object is up to you: Fides ignores it.

data_categories.title: Data Categories
data_categories.description: Array of Data Category resources identified by `fides_key`, that apply to all collections in the Dataset.

data_qualifier.title: Data Qualifier
data_qualifier.description: Array of Data Qualifier resources identified by `fides_key`, that apply to all collections in the Dataset.

fidesctl_meta.title: Fidesctl Meta
fidesctl_meta.description:
The DatasetMetadata resource model.

    Object used to hold application specific metadata for a dataset

joint_controller.title: Joint Controller
joint_controller.description:
The contact details information model.

    Used to capture contact information for controllers, used
    as part of exporting a data map / ROPA.

    This model is nested under an Organization and
    potentially under a system/dataset.

retention.title: Retention
retention.description: An optional string to describe the retention policy for a dataset. This field can also be applied more granularly at either the Collection or field level of a Dataset.

third_country_transfers.title: Third Country Transfers
third_country_transfers.description: An optional array to identify any third countries where data is transited to. For consistency purposes, these fields are required to follow the Alpha-3 code set in [ISO 3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3).

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: An array of objects that describe the Dataset's collections.

DatasetCollection.title: DatasetCollection

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of what this resource is.

data_categories.title: Data Categories
data_categories.description: Array of Data Category resources identified by `fides_key`, that apply to all fields in the collection.

data_qualifier.title: Data Qualifier
data_qualifier.description: Array of Data Qualifier resources identified by `fides_key`, that apply to all fields in the collection.

retention.title: Retention
retention.description: An optional string to describe the retention policy for a Dataset collection. This field can also be applied more granularly at the field level of a Dataset.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: An array of objects that describe the collection's fields.

DatasetCollection.description:
The DatasetCollection resource model.

This resource is nested witin a Dataset.

DatasetField.title: DatasetField

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of what this resource is.

data_categories.title: Data Categories
data_categories.description: Arrays of Data Categories, identified by `fides_key`, that applies to this field.

data_qualifier.title: Data Qualifier
data_qualifier.description: A Data Qualifier that applies to this field. Note that this field holds a single value, therefore, the property name is singular.

retention.title: Retention
retention.description: An optional string to describe the retention policy for a dataset. This field can also be applied more granularly at either the Collection or field level of a Dataset.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: An optional array of objects that describe hierarchical/nested fields (typically found in NoSQL databases).

DatasetField.description:
The DatasetField resource model.

This resource is nested within a DatasetCollection.

DatasetMetadata.title: DatasetMetadata
DatasetMetadata.description:
The DatasetMetadata resource model.

Object used to hold application specific metadata for a dataset

Evaluation.title: Evaluation

fides_key.title: Fides Key
fides_key.description: A uuid generated for each unique evaluation.

status.description: The model for possible evaluation results.

violations.title: Violations
violations.description: The model for violations within an evaluation.

message.title: Message
message.description: A human-readable string response for the evaluation.

Evaluation.description:
The Evaluation resource model.

This resource is created after an evaluation is executed.

PrivacyDeclaration.title: PrivacyDeclaration

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the privacy declaration on the system.

data_categories.title: Data Categories
data_categories.description: An array of data categories describing a system in a privacy declaration.

data_use.title: Data Use
data_use.description: The Data Use describing a system in a privacy declaration.

data_qualifier.title: Data Qualifier
data_qualifier.description: The fides key of the data qualifier describing a system in a privacy declaration.

data_subjects.title: Data Subjects
data_subjects.description: An array of data subjects describing a system in a privacy declaration.

dataset_references.title: Dataset References
dataset_references.description: Referenced Dataset fides keys used by the system.

egress.title: Egress
egress.description: The resources to which data is sent. Any `fides_key`s included in this list reference `DataFlow` entries in the `egress` array of any `System` resources to which this `PrivacyDeclaration` is applied.

ingress.title: Ingress
ingress.description: The resources from which data is received. Any `fides_key`s included in this list reference `DataFlow` entries in the `ingress` array of any `System` resources to which this `PrivacyDeclaration` is applied.

PrivacyDeclaration.description:
The PrivacyDeclaration resource model.

States a function of a system, and describes how it relates
to the privacy data types.

matches.description:
The MatchesEnum resource model.

    Determines how the listed resources are matched in the evaluation logic.

values.title: Values
values.description: A list of fides keys to be used with the matching type in a privacy rule.

The PrivacyRule resource model.

A list of privacy data types and what match method to use.

fides_key.title: Fides Key

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of what this resource is.

Registry.description:
The Registry resource model.

Systems can be assigned to this resource, but it doesn't inherently
point to any other resources.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of filter to be used (i.e. ignore_resource_arn)

value.title: Value
value.description: A string representation of resources to be filtered. Can include wildcards.

SpecialCategoriesEnum.title: SpecialCategoriesEnum
SpecialCategoriesEnum.description:
The model for processing special categories
of personal data.

Based upon article 9 of the GDPR

StatusEnum.title: StatusEnum
StatusEnum.description: The model for possible evaluation results.

System.title: System

fides_key.title: Fides Key
fides_key.description: A unique key used to identify this resource.

organization_fides_key.title: Organization Fides Key
organization_fides_key.description: Defines the Organization that this resource belongs to.

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of what this resource is.

registry_id.title: Registry Id
registry_id.description: The id of the system registry, if used.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: An optional property to store any extra information for a system. Not used by fidesctl.

fidesctl_meta.title: Fidesctl Meta
fidesctl_meta.description:
The SystemMetadata resource model.

    Object used to hold application specific metadata for a system

system_type.title: System Type
system_type.description: A required value to describe the type of system being modeled, examples include: Service, Application, Third Party, etc.

data_responsibility_title.description:
The model defining the responsibility or role over
    the system that processes personal data.

    Used to identify whether the organization is a
    Controller, Processor, or Sub-Processor of the data

egress.title: Egress
egress.description: The resources to which the System sends data.

ingress.title: Ingress
ingress.description: The resources from which the System receives data.

privacy_declarations.title: Privacy Declarations
privacy_declarations.description:
The PrivacyDeclaration resource model.

    States a function of a system, and describes how it relates
    to the privacy data types.

system_dependencies.title: System Dependencies
system_dependencies.description: A list of fides keys to model dependencies.

joint_controller.title: Joint Controller
joint_controller.description:
The contact details information model.

    Used to capture contact information for controllers, used
    as part of exporting a data map / ROPA.

    This model is nested under an Organization and
    potentially under a system/dataset.

third_country_transfers.title: Third Country Transfers
third_country_transfers.description: An optional array to identify any third countries where data is transited to. For consistency purposes, these fields are required to follow the Alpha-3 code set in ISO 3166-1.

administrating_department.title: Administrating Department
administrating_department.description: An optional value to identify the owning department or group of the system within your organization

data_protection_impact_assessment.title: Data Protection Impact Assessment
data_protection_impact_assessment.description:
The DataProtectionImpactAssessment (DPIA) resource model.

    Contains information in regard to the data protection
    impact assessment exported on a data map or Record of
    Processing Activities (RoPA).

    A legal requirement under GDPR for any project that
    introduces a high risk to personal information.

System.description:
The System resource model.

Describes an application and includes a list of PrivacyDeclaration resources.

SystemMetadata.title: SystemMetadata

resource_id.title: Resource Id
resource_id.description: The external resource id for the system being modeled.

endpoint_address.title: Endpoint Address
endpoint_address.description: The host of the external resource for the system being modeled.

endpoint_port.title: Endpoint Port
endpoint_port.description: The port of the external resource for the system being modeled.

SystemMetadata.description:
The SystemMetadata resource model.

Object used to hold application specific metadata for a system

UserCreate.title: UserCreate
UserCreate.description: Data required to create a FidesUser.

UserLogin.title: UserLogin

Similar to UserCreate except we do not need the extra validation on
username and password.

UserLoginResponse.title: UserLoginResponse
UserLoginResponse.description: Similar to UserResponse except with an access token

UserPasswordReset.title: UserPasswordReset
UserPasswordReset.description: Contains both old and new passwords when resetting a password

UserUpdate.title: UserUpdate
UserUpdate.description: Data required to update a FidesopsUser

ValidTargets.description: Validation of targets attempted to generate resources from

ValidationTarget.title: ValidationTarget
ValidationTarget.description: Allowed targets for the validate endpoint

violating_attributes.description: The model for attributes which led to an evaluation violation

data_uses.title: Data Uses
